Name: batch_size_grokking
Title: Batch Size Grokking: Assessing the impact of the training batchsize on the grokking phenomenon
Experiment: Modify the experiments to dynamically adjust the batch size during training, starting with a small batch size and gradually increasing it. This could potentially lead to faster generalization on the validation set.

Name: input_noise_grokking
Title: The Impact of Input Noise on Grokking: A Study of Robustness and Generalization
Experiment: Modify the train function to add Gaussian noise to the input data with varying levels of noise. Analyze the model's generalization performance and training dynamics.

Name: curriculum_grokking
Title: Gradual Difficulty Curriculum Learning for Efficient Grokking
Experiment: Modify the fetch_output function to introduce a difficulty parameter, which controls the complexity of the mathematical operation. Increase the difficulty level gradually over time and evaluate the model's performance on the validation set.
